mapper.sql: id, schedule_id AS scheduleId, status, start_time AS startTime, end_time AS endTime
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO schedule_execute_result (schedule_id, status, start_time, end_time) VALUES (#{scheduleId}, #{status}, now(), null)
mapper.update: UPDATE schedule_execute_result SET status = #{status}, end_time = now() WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM schedule_execute_result WHERE schedule_id = #{scheduleId} ORDER BY id DESC limit 1
